info.name: Flow
info.summary: Automate and Streamline Your Workflows in Nextcloud
info.description:
Flow is a powerful automation and workflow application, fully integrated into your Nextcloud ecosystem. Designed with a sleek interface and advanced capabilities, Flow empowers you to streamline tasks, automate repetitive processes, and enhance collaborationâ€”all within the secure and familiar environment of Nextcloud.
### With Flow, you can:
- Automate complex workflows with ease using intuitive drag-and-drop features. - Schedule tasks, set triggers, and monitor progress in real-time. - Keep your team in sync by connecting various apps and services, all under one platform. - Enjoy a seamless experience, whether you're managing documents, communications, or custom workflows.
Flow is the key to unlocking enhanced productivity in Nextcloud, designed to be both user-friendly and flexible, so you can focus on what truly matters.
**Requires [`AppAPI`](https://github.com/nextcloud/app_api) and `webhook_listeners` to be enabled to work.**
